basics.name: DFW Personal Chef
basics.label: Senior Executive, Senior Tax Specialist, Manager
basics.summary: Operations Management - Growth Strategies - Data & Financial Analysis Award winning, analytical and data driven decision making manager with 15 years experience in business management and astute understanding of accounting, taxation, marketing, sales and administrative procedures.

work.name: DFW Personal Chef
work.summary: Devised and executed growth plans entailing market penetration and expansion, product development and diversification. Led and mentored 27 team members.

work.name: DFW Personal Chef
work.summary: Prepared complex State and Federal tax returns for individuals, trusts, partnerships, corporations, charities and foreign tax clients. Collaborated and advised taxpayers with IRS inquiries and notices. Participated in networking and business development activities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed Steak and Ale's #1 Texas location in revenue generation ($3.93 million annually). Supervised all staff hiring, onboarding, training, retention initiatives, performance appreciation and disciplinary actions.
